name: Dream shop

text: This Website is Resell Product website. Sell Your secend Hand Phone

text2: Admin Authorization system, The admin manages the user and seller. Admin wants to delete any sellers and User.
text3: Database MongoDB mange user seller and admin role. All user and seller data save MongoDB atlais
